title: Karthus has a 1% pickrate
body: But somehow entire gameplay board is a karthus main LUL

replies.body: {{champion:266}}
Gosh aatrox circlejerk is fucking aids
He needs buffs but people need to fuck off with the idea of making him untargetable during Q and ridiculous changes like giving him old sion's ult, or during his ult he always does the 3rd W proc
But neither of those is a bad idea.
Sion's old ult wasn't really great balance wise.

Look, when I make an argument, I try to avoid at all costs any form of "You main this" and "You're just a x hater" bullshit but I'm going to do it right now because it's sickening. Look, I respect the fact you don't like windman, but if you seriously need to get those ideas out of your head and you clearly have 0 idea of how broken aatrox already is and would be if he untargetable. 

First off, making Aatrox untargetable during his Q is basically giving him a mini malphite ult on a ~14 seconds cooldown. That. is. not. a.fucking. good. idea. It's retarded as shit and forces you to nuke other parts of his kit because of this. It's directly removing counterplay. A good change would to make it more rewarding to land, or increase the animation speed so a mordekaiser on 500 pings can't dodge it without any problems. 

Second off, with old sion's ult, it makes aatroxes towerdives even stronger than before for no reason and makes it impossible to stop him in a 1v1 without CC. It's simply not a good idea and doesn't fit his theme. Aatrox didn't heal people, he inspired them to go ham.

How broken aatrox is? HE IS CRAP! He is utter trash because of a hard to balance kit that has to be reworked.

You dont need to necessaraly make him untargetable, but maybe at least immune to cc for that duration, or at least make it not interruptable. Considering that Riot is alright with the idea of fizz troll pole, this should not be such a bad idea either.

And again, aatrox towerdives? Does anyone play him anymore? I play him on jungle sometimes, and believe me, he is not good. Even on lane, especially in current meta, he is not good. For you to even think about a towerdive, you have to snowball hard. It would at least make aatrox threathening, because currently, he is not in any way a consideration for the enemy team unless fed (Which applies to every champ).

Maybe not direct Sions ult, but someting simmilar, maybe again, like you said, involving giving the team damage. Its just that, until his rework comes (Like 5 years after) he will be kept shit, and i dont like that, i would like Riot to at least try to balance him and to make him better and not keep him at trash level for 5 years.

Look, I don't like the fact they dumpster'd aatrox neither. But peple need to realize that aatrox's playstyle is all around revolving statcheck and unless aatrox's heal is no longer useful in a 1v1 there is simply no way riot can buff the other parts of his kit without nuking his Q/E/R. His passive is a problem too, it isn't very useful on him (And makes his entire kit clunky af and base stats talon levels of low to compensate).

As a once main and Mastery 7 player, his Q is the worst part of his kit and ruins his play because of how unforgiving it can be. The epicenter is too small for the knockup and it's extremely easy to miss given how much mobility has evolved since his release. That being said, Untargetability during Dark Flight would be stupid as all hell. 

His Q simply needs a duration where it can't be displaced, mostly when he's winding up at the peak of the animation. Any form of displacement ruins the ability so much, mostly because of the long wind-up and that Aatrox is a seriously outdated champion compared to other Divers/Bruisers. You can make mistakes more often with others, but if you screw up Aatrox's Q, you lose whatever fight you were going to initiate/disengage. 

And Sion's old ultimate was dumped for being an unhealthy mechanic (an AURA mechanic, to say the least). It's a lazy suggestion and it drives me insane when I see people casually upvote it because they won't come up with anything better.

I remember a while ago when   Not Dominion   was up there was an Aatrox on the enemy team. He tried to E-Slow me and then  knock me up. I remember just casually turning around the opposite direction after he started his Q, completely ignoring it, flinging a spell at him after he landed, and leaving. I felt **really** bad for him right there.

Instead of untargetability, they should make his q  give you a steroid on hit, so if you do successfully land it you get something like %attack speed for number of champions hit , or bonus lifesteal on champions damaged by your q for x seconds, or if you hit an enemy champion your next attack against them does bonus damage and heals you for a % of their max how or something, make it interesting and satisfying to land,  since it's so damn difficult

Edit: phone autocorrects q to questions
I think he needs to just be invulnerable during the first 1/3 of his Q where he goes vertical. After that I don't care.
No, he can be unstoppable under certain conditions but making him untargetable is plain stupid. He isn't a nimble fighter, he jumps in your face and DGAFS.

Oh I'm sorry I'll just simply stop caring about the state of balance of champions I don't consistently play. X Champion might have a 10% winrate, but he has a <1% pickrate and I don't play him so I'm not allowed to talk! Even if Riot decides to nerf him more I shouldn't say anything because I don't play him and obviously that means I shouldn't complain about his state of balance!

My theory is that, deep down, we're all truly miserable creatures. We have been cursed with liking a champion no one else likes, a champion Riot deems toxic, and forever downtrodden with being good at a champion who isn't even remotely good. I awake every morning with bloodshot eyes, an emotionless face, wondering why oh god why do I play mordekaiser. The word "<1% playrate" rings through my mind like a bee buzzing. With little or no feelings at all, I walk to my computer, sit down, and  robotically que up and click that metal man, see his terrifying face and weep. Then, in my depression I come here, to vent with people of my kind, people that understand me, people that want to help me.
